entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Carberry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:22 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Carberry 07:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -28.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -31.1°C
Wind: W 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this afternoon. Local blowing snow this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 23 December 2022
